item.title: Products Shortcodes
item.dc:creator: royho
item.content:encoded:
Product Slider

[sp-product-slider categories="30" title="" items_visible="4"]

Shortcode:

[sp-code][sp-product-slider categories="30" title="" items_visible="4"][/sp-code]

Options:

  • custom_pick Product IDs separate each one with a comma. This setting supercedes categories.
  • categories Category IDs separate each one with a comma.
  • title The title you want to show for your slider.
  • count 6 How many items you would like to get.
  • randomize true / false. Randomizes the products on display.
  • order DESC / ASC. The sorting order ascending or descending.
  • items_visible 3 How many items visible in the slider at once.
  • auto_scroll false / true. Turn on auto scroll.
  • auto_scroll_interval 6000 How many seconds inbetween scrolls. 6000 for 6 seconds.
  • transition_speed 200 The animation speed between the slide transitions. 200 for 200ms.
  • circular true / false. Allow slider to loop around in circulars infinitely.
  • show_nav true / false. Shows hides the navigation arrows.
  • items_per_click 1 How many items to scroll by per click.
  • easing easeInOutQuad The animation easing effect to use during slide transitions. Refer to your theme documentation for list of easing options.
  • pause_on_hover true / false. Whether to pause the slider when mouse is hovered over.
  • custom_class Adds additional class so you can manipulate the styles for just this slider.

item.title: Tabs Shortcodes
item.dc:creator: royho
item.content:encoded:
Tabs

[sp-tabs tab_names="Awesome,eCommerce,Theme"][sp-tab-content tab="Awesome"]There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable. The generated Lorem Ipsum is therefore always free from repetition, injected humour, or non-characteristic words etc.[/sp-tab-content][sp-tab-content tab="eCommerce"]It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).[/sp-tab-content][sp-tab-content tab="Theme"]Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.[/sp-tab-content][/sp-tabs] [sp-tabs tab_names="Awesome,eCommerce,Theme" style="nav-left"][sp-tab-content tab="Awesome"]There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. Shortcode:

[sp-code] [sp-tabs tab_names="Awesome,eCommerce,Theme"] [sp-tab-content tab="Awesome"]There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum....[/sp-tab-content] [sp-tab-content tab="eCommerce"]It is a long established fact that a reader...[/sp-tab-content] [sp-tab-content tab="Theme"]Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text...[/sp-tab-content] [/sp-tabs] [/sp-code]

Tabs Options:

  • tab_names Tab1 Name of the tabs you want separate each one with a comma.
  • width auto Width of the tab container. You can enter pixels. Recommended to leave as auto.
  • collapsible false / true. Sets whether the tab is collapsible.
  • active 1 Sets which tab you want to be initially active on load.
  • style nav-top / nav-left. Sets the style of the tabs.
  • tab_icon Enter the icon name for the icon you want to show in the tab. Refer to your theme documentation for list of icon fonts to use.
  • custom_class Adds additional class so you can manipulate the styles for just this slider.

Tab Content Options:

  • tab Name of the tab that corresponds to the tab name you set from tabs shortcode.
  • color Text color you would like to use. Enter HEX value.

item.title: Boxes Shortcodes
item.dc:creator: royho
item.content:encoded:
Callout Box

[sp-callout icon="icon-info" title="Information Callout"]There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words[/sp-callout] [sp-callout title="Warning Callout" type="alert-warning"]There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words[/sp-callout] [sp-callout title="Danger Callout" type="alert-danger"]There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words[/sp-callout] [sp-callout title="Success Callout" type="alert-success"]There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words[/sp-callout]

Shortcode:

[sp-code][sp-callout icon="icon-info"]There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words[/sp-callout][/sp-code]

Options:

  • type alert-info / alert-warning / alert-danger / alert-success
  • title The title you want for your callout box.
  • icon Icon class name to show next to title. Refer to your theme documentations for a list of icon fonts.
  • custom_class Adds additional class so you can manipulate the styles for just this slider.

Image Link Box

[sp-imagelinkbox link_text="Click Me" img="http://bravo.splashingpixels.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2012/07/bedroom-roman.jpg"]

Shortcode:

[sp-code][sp-imagelinkbox link_text="Click Me" img=""][/sp-code]

Options:

  • url URL where the link links to.
  • img URL of the image you would like to show.
  • link_text The link text you would like to show.
  • custom_class Adds additional class so you can manipulate the styles for just this slider.

Light Box

[sp-grid first=true span=4] [sp-lightbox title="My Lightbox" url="http://bravo.splashingpixels.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2012/07/chairs-2.jpg" thumbnail="http://bravo.splashingpixels.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2012/07/chairs-2-357x265.jpg" group="together"] [/sp-grid] [sp-grid span=4] [sp-lightbox title="My Lightbox" url="http://bravo.splashingpixels.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2012/07/chairs-3.jpg" thumbnail="http://bravo.splashingpixels.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2012/07/chairs-3-360x265.jpg" group="together"] [/sp-grid] [sp-grid span=4 last=true] [sp-lightbox title="My Lightbox" url="http://bravo.splashingpixels.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2012/07/coffee-low.jpg" thumbnail="http://bravo.splashingpixels.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2012/07/coffee-low-360x265.jpg" group="together"] [/sp-grid]

Shortcode:

[sp-code][sp-lightbox title="" url="" thumbnail="" group=""][/sp-code]

Options:

  • title Sets the title of the link.
  • url URL of the full size image your would like to expand to.
  • group Set a name for the group you would like to show in lightbox together.
  • poster_size large / small When using video like Youtube or Vimeo, it sets the size of poster image to load.
  • thumbnail Thumbnail of the image before lightbox opens.
  • custom_class Adds additional class so you can manipulate the styles for just this slider.

item.title: Accordion Shortcode
item.dc:creator: royho
item.content:encoded:
Accordion Shortcode

[sp-accordion style=1][sp-accordion-content title="Panel 1"]There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words[/sp-accordion-content][sp-accordion-content title="Panel 2"]There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words[/sp-accordion-content][/sp-accordion] [sp-accordion style=2][sp-accordion-content title="Panel 1"]There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words[/sp-accordion-content][sp-accordion-content title="Panel 2"]There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words[/sp-accordion-content][/sp-accordion]

Shortcode:

[sp-code][sp-accordion][sp-accordion-content title="Panel 1"]Your panel content here...[/sp-accordion-content][/sp-accordion][/sp-code]

Accordion Options:

  • collapsible Sets whether the panel can be collapsed.
  • active_panel Sets which panel you want active on page load.
  • style 1 / 2 Two different styles to choose from.
  • custom_class Adds additional class so you can manipulate the styles for just this slider.

Accordion Content Options:

  • title Title of the accorion.
  • icon Sets an icon next to the title. Refer to the theme documentation for a listing icon fonts.

item.title: Social Media Shortcodes
item.dc:creator: royho
item.content:encoded:
Google Plus One

[sp-gplusone]

Shortcode:

[sp-code][sp-gplusone][/sp-code]

Options:

  • url URL of the item you want to plus one on. Defaults to current page URL.
  • size standard small / medium / tall. Sets the size of the button.
  • annotation inline bubble / none. Sets the style of counter.

Facebook Like

[sp-fblike]

Shortcode:

[sp-code][sp-fblike][/sp-code]

Options:

  • url URL of the item you want to like. Defaults to current page URL.
  • send_button false / true. Shows hides the send button.
  • layout button-count / standard / box_count. The layout of the button.
  • width 75. The width of the button.
  • show_faces false / true. Show hides the photo.
  • verb like / recommend. The verb text of the button.

Twitter Tweet

[sp-tweet]

Shortcode:

[sp-code][sp-tweet][/sp-code]

Options:

  • url URL of the item you want to tweet. Defaults to current page URL.
  • count_position horizontal / none / vertical. Sets counter position.
  • size medium / large. Sets size of button.
  • type share / hashtag / mention. Sets the type of the button.
  • hashtag Set the hashtag.
  • hashtag_text Set the hashtag text only when hashtag is set.
  • tweet_to Set the person to tweet to when button type is set to "mention"

Twitter Follow

[sp-twitter-follow user="splashingpixels"]

Shortcode:

[sp-code][sp-twitter-follow user="splashingpixels"][/sp-code]

Options:

  • user User screen name to follow.
  • size normal / large. Sets size of button.
  • show_username true / false. Show hides the username.

Pinterest Pinit

[sp-pinit]

Shortcode:

[sp-code][sp-pinit][/sp-code]

Options:

  • page_url URL of the item you want to associate with. Defaults to current page URL.
  • image_url URL of the image you want to pin. Defaults to current page's featured image if one exists.
  • description Description of the pinned item.
  • count_layout horizontal / vertical / none. Sets the counter layout.

item.title: Formatting Shortcodes
item.dc:creator: royho
item.content:encoded:
Grid Shortcode

There a total of 12 columns you can use to create your layout. Each row must add up to 12 columns.

[sp-grid first=true span=6]

6 columns

[/sp-grid][sp-grid last=true span=6]

6 columns

[/sp-grid] [sp-grid first=true span=3]

3 columns

[/sp-grid][sp-grid last=true span=9]

9 columns

[/sp-grid] [sp-grid first=true span=9]

9 columns

[/sp-grid][sp-grid last=true span=3]

3 columns

[/sp-grid] [sp-grid first=true span=4]

4 columns

[/sp-grid][sp-grid last=true span=8]

8 columns

[/sp-grid] [sp-grid first=true span=11]

11 columns

[/sp-grid][sp-grid last=true span=1]

1 column

[/sp-grid]

Shortcode:

[sp-code][sp-grid first=true span=6][/sp-grid][sp-grid last=true span=6][/sp-grid][/sp-code]

Options:

  • span Set how many columns to span.
  • offset Set the offset of a column.
  • first true Declares the first column.
  • last true Declares the last column so elements can clear.

Horizontal Rule Shortcode

With this shortcode you can create horizontal line rules to serve as a stylish divider.

[sp-hr] [sp-hr color="e66f6f"] [sp-hr color="75eebc"] [sp-hr color="407abc"] [sp-hr color="bc4072"] [sp-hr color="e66f6f" thickness=3] [sp-hr color="75eebc" thickness=3] [sp-hr color="407abc" thickness=3] [sp-hr color="bc4072" thickness=3] [sp-hr color="e66f6f" style=dotted] [sp-hr color="75eebc" style=dotted] [sp-hr color="407abc" style=dotted] [sp-hr color="bc4072" style=dotted]

Shortcode:

[sp-code][sp-hr][/sp-code]

Options:

  • color The color of the line you want. Use HEX value.
  • style dashed / solid / dotted The style of the line.
  • width 100% Set how wide you want the line. Recommended to leave default.
  • thickness 1 Set how thick you want the line to be. Use pixels.
  • custom_class Adds additional class so you can manipulate the styles for just this shortcode.

Dropcap Shortcode

With this shortcode you can make the first letter of a word in a paragraph larger to give it emphasis.

[sp-dropcap]A[/sp-dropcap]pple is a nutritious food that everyone should be consuming. There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words

There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words

Shortcode:

  • size 60 The size you want the text to be. Use pixels.

  • bg_style square / circle Set style you want for the background color.

Blockquote Shortcode

With this shortcode you can create a blockquote.

[sp-blockquote]There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words.[/sp-blockquote]

Shortcode:

[sp-code][sp-blockquote]There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words[/sp-blockquote][/sp-code]

Options:

  • text_align center / left / right Choose how you want to align the quote text.
  • custom_class Adds additional class so you can manipulate the styles for just this shortcode.

Code Display Shortcode

With this shortcode you can display code such as PHP without executing it.

[sp-code][/sp-code]

Shortcode:

[sp-code][ sp-code ][ /sp-code ][/sp-code]

Example has spaces in shortcode for illustration only. Remove spaces in use case.

item.title: Back to Top Shortcode
item.dc:creator: royho
item.content:encoded:
Back to Top Shortcode

With this shortcode you can display a back to top button to easily scroll back up.

[sp-btt]
[sp-btt style=2 position=right]

Shortcode:

[sp-code][sp-btt][/sp-code]

Options:

  • animate true / false Choose if want the scrolling to animate instead of a jump.
  • text_color ffffff Choose text color you want. Use HEX value.
  • bg_color 000000 Choose the background color of the button. Use HEX value.
  • position left / right / center Choose the position you want the button to display within the container.
  • style 1 / 2 Choose the style you want. 1 is arrow on top and 2 is on the side.
  • custom_class Adds additional class so you can manipulate the styles for just this shortcode.

item.title: Image Link Shortcode
item.dc:creator: royho
item.content:encoded:
Image Link Shortcode

With this shortcode you can display a image link. [sp-image-link image_url="http://bravo.splashingpixels.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2012/07/chairs-3-360x265.jpg" link_url="#" title="Image"]

Shortcode:

[sp-code][sp-image-link image_url="http://bravo.splashingpixels.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2012/07/chairs-3-360x265.jpg" link_url="#" title="Image"][/sp-code]

Options:

  • image_url URL of the image.
  • link_url URL of the link.
  • title Title of the link.
  • custom_class Adds additional class so you can manipulate the styles for just this shortcode.

item.title: Tooltip Link Shortcode
item.dc:creator: royho
item.content:encoded:
Tooltip Link Shortcode

With this shortcode you can add a tooltip link for helpful user experience.

[sp-grid first=true span=3][sp-tooltip url="#" tooltip_title="This is a tooltip!" link_name="Hover over me" position=top][/sp-grid] [sp-grid span=3][sp-tooltip url="#" tooltip_title="This is a tooltip!" link_name="Hover over me" position=bottom][/sp-grid] [sp-grid span=3][sp-tooltip url="#" tooltip_title="This is a tooltip!" link_name="Hover over me" position=left][/sp-grid] [sp-grid last=true span=3][sp-tooltip url="#" tooltip_title="This is a tooltip!" link_name="Hover over me" position=right][/sp-grid]

Shortcode:

[sp-code][sp-tooltip url="#" tooltip_title="This is a tooltip!" link_name="Hover over me"][/sp-code]

Options:

  • position top / left / right / bottom Choose the position you want the tooltip to appear from.
  • url URL of the link.
  • tooltip_title Title of the tooltip.
  • link_name The name to display for the link.

item.title: Google Map Shortcode
item.dc:creator: royho
item.content:encoded:
Google Map Shortcode

With this shortcode you can add a Google Map to your page.

[sp-map width="100%" height="300"]

Shortcode:

[sp-code][sp-map width="100%" height="300" address=""][/sp-code]

Options:

  • width 500 Set the width of the map you would like displayed. We recommend 100% to fill the container.
  • height 300 Set the height of the map in pixels.
  • zoom 15 Set the initial zoom level of the map.
  • address Enter the address you would like the map to center on.
  • static false / true Choose whether you want to show a dynamic map or static.
  • directions_link false / true Setting true will show a directions link to Google.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Thanks for the post mate. I know that in another age you used the 3.7 veiorsn of the WP e-Commerce Plugin and did not like it. So to hear that you're using WPEC 3.8 and liking it, well to me, this is actually a meaningful review and I thank you.I can't say an awful lot about the other Plugins on the market but I know that both WP e-Commerce Plugin and the Shopp Plugin have around 200 hooks and filters whereas Cart66 has 2 (at time of this writing) meaning that WP e-Commerce Plugin is evenly matched with Shopp for developers.Unlike most of the others the WP e-Commerce Plugin 3.8 uses Custom Post Types and has made the switch to using many of the built in WP APIs we've been busy working on this stuff for the past two years making this Plugin awesome for dudes like you. Its this new tight integration with WordPress that makes this release pretty damn nice indeed!!Best,Dan

item.title: Awesome Theme
item.dc:creator: royho
item.content:encoded: I try today Mio and i'm Impressed, unfortunately missing the German translation, but the design is very well done, exactly, a webshop to be today.

item.title: Awesome Theme
item.dc:creator: royho
item.content:encoded: Splashing Pixels themes are by far the greatest themes I've ever seen! The support, from Roy, is unmatched by anyone else. He will be right there with you for any problem you might have that is theme related. I would recommend his product to anyone else!

item.title: Awesome Theme
item.dc:creator: royho
item.content:encoded: I have seen loads of themes in my life, in every possible color and layout. Until I found out about splashingpixels.com I had never seen themes of enterprise grade quality affordable for anyone. Thanks for making me look like a multinational!

item.title: Awesome Theme
item.dc:creator: royho
item.content:encoded: (I'm Brazilian developer (sorry my bad english) Very good!. For purposes of testing, I installed Mio, free, and really liked it and I intend to offer to my clients trade issues.

item.title: Awesome Theme
item.dc:creator: royho
item.content:encoded: i just put my client's site into production with the Mojo theme and everyone loves the look. Roy was a great help when I needed guidance to customize the theme too! Thanks. Here's the site: http://thomasstarbakery.com
